# ðŸ¤– ML Models

This directory stores trained model artifacts (pickled files) for reuse in the dashboard.

- `forecast_model.pkl`: Revenue forecasting model (ARIMA).
- `customer_segmentation.pkl`: K-Means clustering model.
- `pricing_elasticity.pkl`: Pricing optimization model.

*Note: Models are generated by running notebooks 03, 04, and 05.*
